name: Sleepi Boi Can't Sleep
description:
It's a rainy night and Sleepi Boi can't sleep no more. Help him falling asleep and explore his house along the way.

This short story game was made with Bitsy (3D) for the Bitsy november game jam. The theme was SLEEPY.

It's my first ever Bitsy game so let me know what you think. :)
